content: This series of drawings will be dedicated to MixTum collectible cards, created in collaboration with Icarus. ¬†Thanks to icopress and Cygan!Only 20 cards have been released, 4 card is reserved and 16 MixTum cards will be given away!Rules- Free worldwide shipping!- Select your preferred slot.- We reserve the right to ignore any participant for any reason.- Once a block is selected, the last hash symbol will determine the winner.- After one of the users wins a prize and confirms that they have received it, 0.001 btc will be loaded onto the BTC address of the MixTum card.0 - Mortare1 - krogoth2 - TxCryptoKid3 - stackinsats7774 - iwantmyhomepaidwithbtc25 - Suzuki Matt6 - 7 - montreal18 - tldr-hodl9 - PreciousMetapsICTa - YodasRedRocketb - Mitchellc - 2stoutd - SurfinPandae - doblezerof - Bullion-n-BTCPrize informationQuote from: cygan on September 25, 2023, 04:45:08 PMCode:MIXTUM.5 : bc1qm8lr05eznv89dw4dq98fagfqxctmj359xpkpzrMIXTUM.6 : bc1qdes7rptgl7khckrftydjzwge8vvz98lumgxxfcMIXTUM.7 : bc1qwufvklf5hs4yg6cnvk5znawxuz569vqwhtdp2tMIXTUM.8 : bc1qc6hul0d5629jw0hdt6e8v60pntfz0ncgmp3uk4MIXTUM.9 : bc1qv5s07dr2khz6zls370zapmlfxsejm4vdhs7xhwMIXTUM.10 : bc1qvajegrg28xrk8lluwew5gx4dzheq4wx55nkka3MIXTUM.11 : bc1qvy93f2qfhzp3duu48y2p6qpa76jmu4zn0f7trzMIXTUM.12 : bc1qhfslgex6sz32ltena9fvyrzavafvaqjtk7fpp6MIXTUM.13 : bc1qwzxt7ec76c0xtu44zfsz9mqwq8ugyzsjwqpqngMIXTUM.14 : bc1qhpuzh9x56jpqm56g5unfsx652fha7lx65utqk6MIXTUM.15 : bc1qn2aammyuycuuzg0wjkwcl688lpy7h3s4dutz2jMIXTUM.16 : bc1qqdnc2e2k76xdgyspks56zhw8u944qvj89v9rvuMIXTUM.17 : bc1q8hzw609x79pgpqdzqx2j0adsvcvcsmp0pz9pltMIXTUM.18 : bc1qqekzqqm3nehyzqglrpgckvmknewgvdvg3vx299MIXTUM.19 : bc1qdez9l6g0l62vmzk0cgx6lhqtlufs0h92f6w5wxMIXTUM.20 : bc1q65ae6h40cv267vu4ygx9k24vlv8my6rtl93pz8

comments.body: Can previous winner participate? If yes then - 1If no then - ignore my messageNote: Can you give me a little time? I don't know what my postal location is exactly. So I'm talking with some people about it. Trying to sort everything out.
